title: The Brittle Limit
description: A fast-paced CIA suspense novel set in present-day Cambodia, a country in the early stages of outside greed. While investigating the death of an American man in a remote Cambodian province, CIA Agent Andrew Shaw discovers a sinister plot that threatens all expatriates living in the Southeast Asian country. With limited intel on the imminent threat, Andrew must stop a local warlord intent on purging the country of all 'Ch'kais' or foreign vermin. It's a race against time as Andrew tries to save the country and its people from destruction.
author: Kae Bell
